name: BlackWhite (yazAika)
description:
BlackWhite - this is a platformer in which you need to complete levels. Not as easy as it might seem at first glance. My first job. So please, if it’s not difficult to keep the comments off. Thank you very much 

I'm new at this. 4 months ago I did not know anything, a complete zero. All my knowledge is a C ++ beginner course. I made my first project. I would be very grateful if you appreciate it.

Sincerely your : yazAika.
